channel.title: Phone Colorado Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Colorado Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: colorado again
item.description: tonight I fly out to colorado. it will be a lot of fun. hiromi will be coming which will rule. I really don’t know what we will do for the week. but I imagine it will be entertainmentfull ;).i am wearing my new fancy boots. I am attempting to decide whether I am going to wear them to colorado. if I do I have to really commit to wearing them around.
